name: 19115-4 WG draft
description:
## Refactoring to use standard building blocks

Working draft of 19115-4 JSON encoding.

Examples provided by WG - schema generated by Shapechange ?

examples.title: WG-example
examples.content: Example used to scope profile of 19115 for JSON schema. Source is a Geoscience Australia catalog entry,

            <mri:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>
                    Data gathered in the field during the sample collection phase of the National Geochemical Survey of Australia (NGSA) has been used to compile the Preliminary Soil pH map of Australia. 
                    The map, which was completed in late 2009, offers a first-order estimate of where acid or alkaline soil conditions are likely to be expected. 
                    It provides fundamental datasets that can be used for mineral exploration and resource potential evaluation, environmental monitoring, landuse policy development, and geomedical studies into the health of humans, animals and plants.
</gco:CharacterString>
            </mri:abstract>

    <mdb:dataQualityInfo><mdq:DataQuality>
        <mdq:scope><mcc:MD_Scope>
            <mcc:level><mcc:MD_ScopeCode codeList="https://schemas.isotc211.org/Resources/codelists.xml#ISO19115-1.1.cit.CI_OnLineFunctionCode" codeListValue="dataset">dataset</mcc:MD_ScopeCode></mcc:level>
        </mcc:MD_Scope></mdq:scope>
        <mdq:report><mdq:RelativePositionalAccuracy>
            <!-- measure/MeasureReference missing from Table D.15 -->
            <mdq:measure><mdq:MeasureReference>
                <mdq:nameOfMeasure><gco:CharacterString>Comparison of absolute positional accuracy</gco:CharacterString></mdq:nameOfMeasure>
                <mdq:measureDescription><gco:CharacterString>Comparison of absolute positional accuracy using known positional accuracy of the two or more independent objects</gco:CharacterString></mdq:measureDescription>
            </mdq:MeasureReference></mdq:measure>
            <mdq:evaluationMethod><mdq:IndirectEvaluation>
                <mdq:evaluationMethodDescription><gco:CharacterString>Compares absolute possitional accuracy of the archaeological object and
                    the absolute positional accuracy of the river.</gco:CharacterString></mdq:evaluationMethodDescription>
                <mdq:evaluationMethodType><mdq:EvaluationMethodTypeCode codeList="https://schemas.isotc211.org/Resources/codelists.xml#ISO19157-1.1.dqm.DQ_EvaluationMethodTypeCode" codeListValue="indirect">indirect</mdq:EvaluationMethodTypeCode></mdq:evaluationMethodType>
                <mdq:deductiveSource><gco:CharacterString>Positional accuracy of the rivers nearby the archaeological camp.</gco:CharacterString></mdq:deductiveSource>
            </mdq:IndirectEvaluation></mdq:evaluationMethod>
            <mdq:result><mdq:DescriptiveResult>
                <mdq:statement><gco:CharacterString>Relative positional accuracy between the archaeological objects and rivers is higher 
                    than the absolute positional accuracy of the archaeological objects (5m)</gco:CharacterString></mdq:statement>
            </mdq:DescriptiveResult></mdq:result>
        </mdq:RelativePositionalAccuracy></mdq:report>
     </mdq:DataQuality></mdb:dataQualityInfo>
    <!-- example from ISO 19157-1 Annex D/D4.1.2/Table D.16
    The absolute positional accuracy of the topological survey on an archaeological site is evaluated: The result is 5 m accuracy.
    An evaluation of the quality of the evaluation is then provided using the confidence metaquality element, 
    for which a measure called “Safety Factor” is used.
    Table D.16 describes how to report metaquality as metadata.
.-->
    <mdb:dataQualityInfo><mdq:DataQuality>
        <mdq:scope><mcc:MD_Scope>
            <mcc:level><mcc:MD_ScopeCode codeList="https://schemas.isotc211.org/Resources/codelists.xml#ISO19115-1.1.cit.CI_OnLineFunctionCode" codeListValue="dataset">dataset</mcc:MD_ScopeCode></mcc:level>
        </mcc:MD_Scope></mdq:scope>
        <mdq:report><mdq:AbsolutePositionalAccuracy>
            <mdq:measure></mdq:measure>
            <mdq:evaluationMethod></mdq:evaluationMethod>
            <mdq:result></mdq:result>
        </mdq:AbsolutePositionalAccuracy></mdq:report>
        <mdq:report><mdq:AbsolutePositionalAccuracy id="positional_accuracy1">
            <mdq:measure><mdq:MeasureReference>
                <mdq:measureIdentification><mcc:MD_Identifier>
                    <mcc:code><gco:CharacterString>47</gco:CharacterString></mcc:code>
                </mcc:MD_Identifier></mdq:measureIdentification>
                <mdq:nameOfMeasure><gco:CharacterString>Root mean square error planimetry</gco:CharacterString></mdq:nameOfMeasure>
                <mdq:measureDescription><gco:CharacterString>Standard deviation where the true value is not estimated from the observations but known a prioriStandard deviation
                    where the true value is not estimated from the observations but known a priori</gco:CharacterString></mdq:measureDescription>
            </mdq:MeasureReference></mdq:measure>
            <mdq:evaluationMethod><mdq:FullInspection>
                <mdq:evaluationProcedure><cit:CI_Citation>
                    <cit:title><gco:CharacterString>IGN data quality evaluation procedure</gco:CharacterString></cit:title>
                    <cit:date><cit:CI_Date>
                        <cit:date><gco:Date>1995-02-09</gco:Date></cit:date>
                        <cit:dateType><cit:CI_DateTypeCode codeList="https://schemas.isotc211.org/Resources/codelists.xml#ISO19115-1.1.cit.CI_DateTypeCode" codeListValue="creation">creation</cit:CI_DateTypeCode></cit:dateType>
                    </cit:CI_Date></cit:date>
                </cit:CI_Citation></mdq:evaluationProcedure>
            </mdq:FullInspection></mdq:evaluationMethod>
            <mdq:evaluationMethod><mdq:AggregationDerivation>
                <mdq:evaluationMethodType><mdq:EvaluationMethodTypeCode codeList="https://schemas.isotc211.org/Resources/codelists.xml#ISO19157-1.1.dqm.DQ_EvaluationMethodTypeCode" codeListValue="directExternal">directExternal</mdq:EvaluationMethodTypeCode></mdq:evaluationMethodType>
            </mdq:AggregationDerivation></mdq:evaluationMethod>
            <mdq:result><mdq:QuantitativeResult>
                <mdq:value><gco:Record>
                    <gco:field><gco:Field>
                        <gco:value></gco:value>
                        <gco:type><gco:FieldType>
                            <gco:fieldName><gco:CharacterString>metre</gco:CharacterString></gco:fieldName>
                            <gco:fieldType><gco:TypeName>
                                <gco:aName><gco:CharacterString>distance</gco:CharacterString></gco:aName>
                            </gco:TypeName></gco:fieldType>
                        </gco:FieldType></gco:type>
                    </gco:Field></gco:field>
                </gco:Record></mdq:value>
             </mdq:QuantitativeResult></mdq:result>
        </mdq:AbsolutePositionalAccuracy></mdq:report>
        <mdq:report><mdq:Confidence>
            <mdq:measure><mdq:MeasureReference>
                <mdq:measureIdentification><mcc:MD_Identifier>
                    <mcc:authority><cit:CI_Citation>
                        <cit:title><gco:CharacterString>IGN Measures</gco:CharacterString></cit:title>
                        <cit:date><cit:CI_Date>
                            <cit:date><gco:Date>1995-01-01</gco:Date></cit:date>
                            <cit:dateType><cit:CI_DateTypeCode codeList="https://schemas.isotc211.org/Resources/codelists.xml#ISO19115-1.1.cit.CI_DateTypeCode" codeListValue="creation">creation</cit:CI_DateTypeCode></cit:dateType>
                        </cit:CI_Date></cit:date>
                    </cit:CI_Citation></mcc:authority>
                    <mcc:code><gco:CharacterString>1</gco:CharacterString></mcc:code>
                </mcc:MD_Identifier></mdq:measureIdentification>
                <mdq:nameOfMeasure><gco:CharacterString>Safety Factor</gco:CharacterString></mdq:nameOfMeasure>
                <mdq:measureDescription><gco:CharacterString>The ratio between the accuracy class of the evaluation elements and the accuracy class that has to be obtained in the dataset.</gco:CharacterString></mdq:measureDescription>
            </mdq:MeasureReference></mdq:measure>
           <mdq:evaluationMethod><mdq:FullInspection>
               <mdq:evaluationMethodDescription><gco:CharacterString>The bigger the "Safety Factor" is the more trustful is the evaluation.
                   The "Safety Factor" has to be bigger than 2 to validate the evaluation.</gco:CharacterString></mdq:evaluationMethodDescription>
               <mdq:evaluationMethodType><mdq:EvaluationMethodTypeCode codeList="ISO19157-1.1.dqm.DQ_EvaluationMethodTypeCode" codeListValue="directExternal">directExternal</mdq:EvaluationMethodTypeCode></mdq:evaluationMethodType>
                <mdq:evaluationProcedure><cit:CI_Citation>
                    <cit:title><gco:CharacterString>Arrâté 2003 (French legislation)</gco:CharacterString></cit:title>
